title.narrative: Strengthening capacities of teachers in educative innovation as tool to improve learning in schools

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to design, implement and monitor a Training Program for teachers on educational innovation in San Marcos to contribute to the strengthening of the culture of innovation. The project will promote the creation of training spaces for teachers, such as the following: 1. Presence of thematic experts. Specialized professional, in a thematic, area or disciplinary field, that trains and accompanies teachers and IIEE managers involved in the project. 2. Learning communities in networks. They value reflection, cooperation, collaboration, dialogue and participation in a community. 3. Activities with the community, to share, value and promote the participation of the members of the community in order to improve and develop the locality.
